mapper.insert: insert into test_board (title, content, writer, bpw) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{bpw})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from test_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, title, content, writer, bpw, regdate, moddate, viewcnt from test_board where bno = #{bno}
